nodes.text: A battle occurred in the Lantillies system during the Mandalorian Wars. The galactic Republic defeated the Mandalorian Neo-Crusaders there.

The battle is only referenced once in 2009's The Essential Atlas. It is marked on a galactic map showing the battles of the Mandalorian Wars rather than described in prose. Due to its placement without any movement arrows pointing to or from it, the battle in the Lantillies sector could have taken place at any time during the Wars.
